name: FilterPeopleInWorkspace
description:
Filter and search for people in your workspace.

Use this tool to filter people by segment ID and attribute values using complex filters such as `and`, `or`, and `not`. The tool returns arrays of `identifiers` with detailed information and `ids` with only ID values. Suitable for retrieving up to 1000 people per request.

parameters.name: page_start_token
parameters.description: The token for the page of results to return. Use the 'next' property from responses as this value to access subsequent pages.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of people to retrieve per page. Limited to 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

parameters.name: filter_criteria
parameters.description: Complex JSON object to filter people using `and`, `or`, `not` conditions. Nest arrays to define logic for filtering by segments or attributes.

filter.description: Describe the customers you want to return. Use `and`, `or`, and `not` arrays to group and determine the logic for filter criteria. You can nest and, or, and not arrays to produce complex filters.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io App API

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

value_schema.description: The token for the page of results you want to return. Responses contain a `next` property. Use this property as the `start` value to return the next page of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results you want to retrieve per page.

filter.description: Describe the customers you want to return. Use `and`, `or`, and `not` arrays to group and determine the logic for filter criteria. You can nest and, or, and not arrays to produce complex filters.
